t:
This is when I prove to my friend that I'm not afraid of anything.
With him standing outside, I enter the cemetery. It's quite around here, as I stroll through the graves.

I stand dead on my tracks as I find his severed head on one of the tombstones with the word ‘RUN’ written with his blood.
c:
Which one's the trick? The friend outside, or the head here?


#Collab and complete the musing. #halfpasttwelve #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba





#notafraid #nofear #head #cemetery #gravestone
